posts.post_content: Not that terrible. It's not that likely that by turn 4 your opponent would have much in his graveyard, definitely not anything better than this guy. Still, with this kind of drawback it should've been a 5/5.

posts.post_content:
Meh, black is a gamble.
  
I'd run this guy for the hell of it,
  
But [Gravedigger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravedigger) is a better bet for most games,
  
Simply because it gives only you the creature,
  
And it's a Zombie.

posts.post_content: Polzini - That would be true if protection worked in zones other than the graveyard, and also if Emrakul was able to be in the graveyard at any point. His graveyard ability is a replacement effect, stating *if he would be, then* not *when he is*.
